General.Name: Elite Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Elite Material Co., Ltd. produces and sells copper clad laminates, electronic-industrial specialty chemical and raw materials, and electronic components in Taiwan, China, and internationally. It also offers printed circuit board; and engages in prepreg business. The company engages in electronics, telecommunications equipment, and batteries wholesale and retail business; generates and distributes power; manufactures machinery; and engages in import/ export business. Its products are used in various industries, including mobile devices; cloud data centers; infrastructure network; electric vehicle, and autonomous driving applications. Elite Material Co. Ltd. was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Taoyuang, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.18, Datong 1st Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 32849
